name: Super Happy Fun Sun
description:
Super Happy Fun Sun is a small prototype exploration/puzzle game developed in December 2015 in which players must awaken planets, light nebulae and set comets into motion to bring happiness to the universe!

Gameplay focuses on movement challenges involving inertia, gravity and collision.

The game as it currently exists is a prototype made across a ten day period in 2015. These builds aren't quite a full game, but hopefully give an impression of how a full game based on the Super Happy Fun Sun concept could feel. If you like what you see here, contact us and let us know!

Be sure to read the readme, and enjoy the game!
